channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: Morning Briefing: Top stories from The Straits Times on Sept 17
item.description:
September 17, 2021 7:53 AM

Good morning! Here are our top stories to kick-start your Friday, Sept 17.

item.title: Save as you spend: two mobile apps every savvy shopper needs
item.description:
September 17, 2021 4:00 AM

You can now earn CapitaLand reward points instantly with your DBS/POSB cards – link your CapitaStar account to your PayLah! app to start enjoying discounts and vouchers
